name: lepid opera (or: a week in a kaiju lab)
name_original: lepid opera (or: a week in a kaiju lab)
description:
✨ spend 7 days in a kaiju lab talking to a giant beautiful monster ✨

--

Game for the one room bitsy jam, inspired by how obsessed I was with Mothra in the recent Godzilla movie. It all takes place in the lab (copied 6 more times)  for the 1 room theme.
